name: fear-greed-twitter-bot
description: - [X] Terraform: create a couple of lambdas and a SQS queue in between them, also a DynamoDB table to store some data. - [X] Twitter API: basic usage of the API - [X] Typescript must be set in the most strict level in `.tsconfig` - [X] Compile TS project and bundle it to deploy as JS lambda [1] - [X] Find a good graphical diagram tool
